tool_description: Evaluates the quality and reliability of OCR-extracted text by analyzing character confidence scores, formatting consistency, and text coherence to identify areas requiring manual review.

extracted_text.description: OCR-extracted text content to evaluate for quality

character_confidences.description: Individual confidence scores (0-100) for each character in the extracted text

quality_threshold.description: Minimum acceptable confidence score (0-100) for text quality

flag_low_confidence_words.description: Whether to identify individual words with low confidence scores

error_messages: Text and confidence mismatch: The length of extracted_text must match the number of character_confidences provided.
Invalid confidence scores: All character_confidences must be numbers between 0 and 100.
Quality threshold out of range: quality_threshold must be between 0 and 100.
Extracted text empty: Cannot evaluate confidence for empty text content.
usage: Provide the extracted_text and corresponding character_confidences from OCR processing. Set quality_threshold for acceptable confidence levels and enable flag_low_confidence_words to identify problematic text regions. Returns comprehensive quality assessment.

overall_confidence.description: Average confidence score (0-100) for the entire text

quality_rating.description: Overall quality assessment: excellent, good, fair, or poor

low_confidence_segments.description: Text portions that fall below the quality threshold

word_accuracy_estimate.description: Estimated percentage of correctly recognized words

requires_manual_review.description: Whether the document requires human review based on quality assessment
